Summary: Conversion from efavirenz to 8-hydroxyefavirenz. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP1A2, CYP3A5, CYP3A4, CYP2A6 or CYP2B6.
Conversion from 8-hydroxyefavirenz to 8,14-dihydroxyefavirenz. This interaction is catalyzed by CYP2B6.
Conversion from 8,14-dihydroxyefavirenz to 8,14-dihydroxyefavirenz glucuronide. This interaction is catalyzed by UGT.
Conversion from efavirenz to 7-hydroxyefavirenz. This interaction is catalyzed by CYP2A6.
Conversion from efavirenz to efavirenz-n-glucuronide. This interaction is catalyzed by UGT2B7.
Conversion from 8-hydroxyefavirenz to 8-hydroxyefavirenz glucuronide. This interaction is catalyzed by UGT.
Conversion from 7-hydroxyefavirenz to 7-hydroxyefavirenz glucuronide. This interaction is catalyzed by UGT.
